attributes.action: Re-instate British dignity by banning political correctness against all things British!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more we hear of political correctness undermining our countries right to show it's support for British patriotism.
This Government should make a stand and call a halt once and for all to the "disgusting" cow-towing to the PC brigade, just because "OUR" Union Flag or "OUR" traditions offend someone!
Should those people even be here if we as a nation offend them so much?
